DOC.detailed_description: The clinical response antidepressant treatment elderly variable often slow , difficult predict reliably 4-5 week treatment . The delayed onset antidepressant activity particularly problematic elderly , prolong duration suffer disability , reduce compliance , increase risk attempt complete suicide . This study seek develop method effective rapid treatment major depressive episode elderly improve early identification treatment non-responders , combine sleep deprivation ( one night ) paroxetine probe treatment response treatment resistance . This experimental study randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled . We recruit 158 elderly depress patient current major depressive episode randomly assign 36 patient three intervention : 1 ) TSD + paroxetine ; 2 ) TSD + placebo ; 3 ) paroxetine alone without TSD ) . The duration experimental phase study 17 day : 3 day pre-treatment sleep study 14 day initial paroxetine placebo treatment double-blind condition .
